name: black glass
description: An endless expanse of liquid black glass.  It perfectly reflects the darkness around it. Movement through this medium seems like it would be incredibly slow.

name: flesh amalgamation
description: Unidentifiable, possibly semi-organic material simulatiously occupying the same space as another rigid inorganic material.

name: black glass
description: An endless expanse of static negative space, seemingly solid enough to deny the passage of even semi-tangible matter.
